page.title: 19FREE TIME.
page.content: From the results of a local survey we have found that in the country the farming community{do not have much } {free time.}There is always something to be doing on the farm. They also have to travel long distances to reach theatres, cinemas e.t.c. so most people just attend the local events such as the village sports, fetes and whist drives. Michaelchurch does have a{Clay } {Pigeon Shoot Club}and a{Cricket Club.} Card games are very popular, most families playing regularly at home. {Whist}is probably the favourite game. The area is so beautiful that a lot of local people enjoy{walking on the {hills.}The bad weather in the winter and the lack of local entertainment facilities forces most people to watch television or read during these months.
